SELECT sum(total) FROM (SELECT count(1) AS total FROM FirstPageMedicalRecord WHERE DISCHAWAYCODE in ('2','3') AND OUT_HP_DT >= #{startTime} AND OUT_HP_DT < #{endTime} UNION ALL SELECT count(1) AS total FROM ED_CMEDICAL_HOME_PAGE_RECORD WHERE DISCHAWAYCODE in ('2','3') AND OUT_HP_DT >= #{startTime} AND OUT_HP_DT < #{endTime} )

SELECT sum(total) FROM (SELECT count(DISTINCT(a.HP_S_NO)) AS total FROM outhospitalrecord a LEFT JOIN firstpagemedicalrecord b ON a.HP_S_NO = b.HP_S_NO WHERE a.OHREC_DREC in ('1','3') AND b.IF_OPREA = '1' AND a.OUT_HP_DT >= #{startTime} AND a.OUT_HP_DT < #{endTime} UNION ALL SELECT count(DISTINCT(a.HP_S_NO)) AS total FROM outhospitalrecord a LEFT JOIN ed_cmedical_home_page_record c ON a.HP_S_NO = c.HP_S_NO WHERE a.OHREC_DREC in ('1','3') AND c.IF_OPREA = '1' AND a.OUT_HP_DT >= #{startTime} AND a.OUT_HP_DT < #{endTime})
